product_name: SunCloud Colfax Polarized Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a contemporary twist on a vintage style, the SunCloud Colfax Polarized Sunglasses let you enjoy sunny skies while offering complete protection from glare and UV rays. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Glasses feature 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number, the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6-, 7-, 8- and 9-base curvature). Microfiber bag is included for storage and cleaning, helping to preserve optical quality. The SunCloud Colfax Polarized Sunglasses are designed to fit medium-sized faces. Closeout.
short_description: With a contemporary twist on a vintage style, the SunCloud Colfax Polarized Sunglasses let you enjoy sunny skies while offering complete protection from glare and UV rays.
